assetRequirements.purpose: to capture the essence of autumn in Turkey, showcasing warm weather and beautiful landscapes
assetRequirements.visual_style: vibrant and colorful, reflecting the beauty of Turkish autumn
assetRequirements.content_context: depicting sunny beaches, cultural experiences, and autumnal scenery

assetRequirements.purpose: to highlight Antalya as a key travel destination
assetRequirements.visual_style: picturesque, showcasing local attractions and nature
assetRequirements.content_context: focusing on Antalya's beaches and cultural offerings

usageInstructions.placement: Place according to campaign layout requirements
usageInstructions.context: Use in context of: Погрузитесь в осеннюю сказку Турции с Kupibilet!. Ensure asset aligns with brand guidelines and campaign messaging.
usageInstructions.responsiveBehavior: Scale proportionally for mobile devices. Ensure minimum readable size on small screens.
emailClientNotes: Large file size may affect loading in some email clients
usageInstructions.accessibilityRequirements: Ensure alt text is provided: "AI-selected hero". Alt text should be descriptive and convey the image's purpose in the email context.
usageInstructions.fallbackStrategy: If image fails to load, display alt text with appropriate background color
